channel.title: Pk points help! 317 Delta

item.title: Pk points help! 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @mostwanted8 mostwanted8
item.description:
@mostwanted8 wrote:

hey moparscape i need help with pk points
this is my code if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && isInminiedge() && isInInnerWild() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 4 && playerRights != 20 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; if(isInsafewild() == false){ if(isIndeathisland() == false){ if (startersfail <= 4 == false) { youdied(); killerz.rating += 15; lastKilled = killerz.playerName; killerz.lastKilled = playerName; ResetAttack(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); killerz.pkPoints += 5;

When Ever I Atack An Npc And Run From it and leave it and anather player comes and atack the npc and get killed by it
it will say you have defeated him and i get pk points
any way to fix that pleeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeaseeeeeeeeeee

Read full topic
